name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.152.0
- Lots of backend fixes
- Stability and bug fixes
- Added 3 new cards: Mountain, Yami, Token Vacuum
- Changed Mystical keyword to Spellcaster
- Summoning power logic is vastly improved
- Added mod settings config panel options: remove toons, remove exodia cards, remove crossover mod cards, change card set size



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
